text: Haydar Hassan Haj Al-Sidig (1 April 1949 – 12 February 2025), known as Ali Gagarin, was a Sudanese footballer. He played with Al-Hilal Club. He also made 33 appearances for the Sudan national football team from 1967 to 1977. Gagarin died on 12 February 2025 in Cairo, Egypt at the age of 75.الموت يغيّب أسطورة السودان ونجم النصر السابق ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Sudanese people Category:African footballers
title: Ali Gagarin
